dict.string: Time Left:
This is the label at the bottom of the screen that preceeds the actual countdown value.
To continue, drag the triangle shape to the square in the corner.
This is the description shown on the screen just below the title when the target shape is a triangle.
To continue, drag the square shape to the square in the corner.
This is the description shown on the screen just below the title when the target shape is a square.
To continue, drag the pentagon shape to the square in the corner.
This is the description shown on the screen just below the title when the target shape is a pentagon.
To continue, drag the circle shape to the square in the corner.
This is the description shown on the screen just below the title when the target shape is a circle.
Parental Gate
This is the title displayed at the top of the screen.
OK
The title of the button used to dismiss the alert
Too Many Tries!
The title of the alert.
You tried to many times without getting the right shape into the box.
This is the message the user sees after they exceeded the maximum number of attempts.
OK
The title of the button used to dismiss the alert
Time has Expired!
The title of the alert.
You failed to drag the correct shape to the target box in the specified amount of time.
This is the message the user sees after they exceeded the maximum number of attempts.
